thread.title: Trump praises House report on Russia

title: Trump praises House report on Russia
text:
Trump praises House report on Russia 1:11pm EDT - 01:15
President Trump says ''we should get on with our lives'' after House Republicans release a controversial report citing there was no evidence Trump's campaign colluded with Russia. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
President Trump says "we should get on with our lives" after House Republicans release a controversial report citing there was no evidence Trump's campaign colluded with Russia.
